com.arjuna.OrbCommon
Class ORBInterface

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.arjuna.OrbCommon.ORBInterface
public class ORBInterface
extends java.lang.Object

An attempt at some ORB portable ways of interacting with the ORB. NOTE: initORB *must* be called if you want to use the pre- and post- initialisation mechanisms.

Since:
JTS 1.0.

Method Detail

init

public static void init()
                 throws org.omg.CORBA.SystemException
Ensure that all ORB specific initialisation is done even if the programmer uses the ORB specific init routines. This method does not need to be called if using initORB.
Since:
JTS 2.1.1.
